price: Bya Farawo, wari warishyize hejuru akaba no mu bakabya.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
